item.title: a quick ride on pagedown: create PDFs from Rmarkdown
item.description: Do we really need a package like pagedown? installing pagedown selecting the preferred template filling in and rendering the template finally obtaining the desired PDF file my suggestions for improvements I recently came across the good talk by the always good Yiuhi Xie at the Rstudio conference about Pagedown. You can see it by yourself reaching out the rstudio website or clicking the image below:
